sequence: <size=45>Chapter 4 - A Room, Two Gamers, And I</size>

scripts.say: This should be the place... Ah, you've got such a wonderful gaming PC!
This room is just the right size, it's just messy enough, the only source of light is the PC monitor, and there's always snacks and drinks just within arm's reach...
It's pretty much perfect... This is what I'd call a room fit for a gamer.
Come on iiiin. Welcome to the Gamer Girl Grotto.

This is a place of relaxation for those who have been freed of their duties, a place where they can spend some time as social rejects and indulge in their love of games and degeneracy... You are welcome here!
Indeed it is. A place such as this is absolutely indispensable for us gamers... I totally know that feel...
When we play games, we don't want to be interrupted by anyone, we want to be free and, how should I say it... We need a place to soothe our minds. An isolated, quiet, peaceful place...
Hum hum, that is the deepest thing I've heard all month... You are a pro, aren't you?
Ayanami told me about you, but I never thought we'd be so in sync with each other... You're a TRUE gamer, aren't you, Miss?
Ohoho, I am honored by your words of praise... However, I have only just gotten started.
I will now give you a lecture on what it really means to be a TRUE gamer!
...CLACK CLACK CLACK CLACK CLACK... KA-CLICK!
Oh my god... She only goes for headshots! And she never misses!
And she plays hunting games solo and without any gear... Then completes it without even taking any damage! How?!
Nobody can beat her at simulators either! She always walks away at the top of the scoreboard!
She tried land, sea, and air combat... She played every military sim there is, and she conquered them all!
Her gaming skills are elder god tier...! And whenever she has the chance, she sips some cola...!
Then she immediately reaches for a bag of chips... I've never seen such a fearsome playstyle before!
...CLACK CLACK CLACK CLACK CLACK... KA-CLICK!
...Phew, that wasn't too bad.
Miss... You're a god among peasants! A gaming god! All I can say is: wow...
I, too, admire you! You are the very god of gaming itself... You have descended from the heavens to grace us with your presence...!
Ohoho, don't be silly, now... I am a god, and a gamer, and a gaming god... But we are known as CPUs!
I am number one! And nobody can beat me!
Our god is a great god...! Let me bow before you!
Well, that's enough fooling around for now... Games are to be treasured, so now let's pick something we can play with several people. I'll give you some useful protips!
You're the boss, boss! I'll pick out something we can play with several people at once.
Hum hum, if that's the plan, then it would be nice if we had a few more players...
So this is the Gamer Girl Grotto where commoners gather to play video games, I see!
You'll have to excuse us. Her Majesty wished to see what this place is about...
...Oh, I guess we just got a few more players.
The Queen herself is here in person, so you'd better entertain me with a game worth my time! Preferably something highly enjoyable that I can win every round of!
...I'm sorry, but can I ask you to go easy on Her Majesty for just the first few rounds?
Sure, come on in~! We don't get visitors every day, so we'll have tons of fun. Let's all be social rejects together~!
That's what I was hoping to hear! I will make it known to the whole world that The Queen always wins! Now pick any game you want and I shall beat you at it!
I think there's a fallacy in there somewhere, but... Are you sure?
Oh my, oh my... It seems two adorable little girls have come my way... Maybe I should go all out, just for you~?
Who are you calling "little"?!
I will not forgive you for calling me "little"...
Hey... That sounds exactly like something Ark Royal would say!
Let's just move on to the games now~! I'm looking forward to having some multiplayer fun with you all~!
Indeed... As you said, you don't get a chance like this every day, so we should enjoy it to the fullest.
